response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us, reflecting its quality, functionality, and the unique benefits it offers. Given its high value, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. We believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you to experience the superior performance and craftsmanship of our product while enjoying a significant savings. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 14000}
